actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: To authorize assistance for electric power utility privatization efforts in the Federal Republic of Nigeria.
short_title: Nigeria Electric Power Utility Privatization Act of 2001

summary.text: Nigeria Electric Power Utility Privatization Act of 2001 - Authorizes the President to establish a program to provide assistance to the Government of the Federal Republic of Nigeria to facilitate electric power utility privatization efforts in the State of Kogi, Nigeria. Sets forth certain program requirements.

titles.title: Nigeria Electric Power Utility Privatization Act of 2001
To authorize assistance for electric power utility privatization efforts in the Federal Republic of Nigeria.
